rooms.description: A spacious living room with Art Deco accents and integrated built-in seating. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light.
An open-plan kitchen with a central island, incorporating Art Deco detailing and wheelchair accessible design. Includes adjacent pantry area.
A dining area integrated into the living room space, allowing flexible usage while maintaining Vastu principles by placing it in the east or northeast corner.
Master bedroom featuring a spacious balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows. Designed to be wheelchair accessible and incorporates Vastu placement for privacy and harmony.

openings.description: Additional exit leading to the garden area and pool.
